  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_bc79b4fd76ff7306420b6e387879a6ea33bd00c6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_bc79b4fd76ff7306420b6e387879a6ea33bd00c6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Covalent compounds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kovalente Mittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composés covalents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compostos covalent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Residui covalenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομοιοπολικές ενώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compuestos covalentes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the dots-and-cross diagrams of various molecules forming covalent bonds and lone pairs. The dots and crosses are the number of electrons in each valence shell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">covalent bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dots-and-cross diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic configuration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">symmetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Punkt-und-Kreuz Diagramme
der verschiedenen Moleküle, die kovalente Bindungen und einsame Paare
bilden. Die Punkte und die Kreuze sind die Zahl Elektronen in 
jedem Wertigkeitshell.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les diagrammes de 
point-et-croix de diverses molécules formant les obligations 
covalentes et les seules paires. Les points et les croix sont le
nombre d'électrons dans chaque interpréteur de commandes interactif 
de valence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os diagramas da 
ponto-e-cruz das várias moléculas que dão forma a ligações 
covalent e a pares solitários. Os pontos e as cruzes são o 
número dos elétrons em cada escudo do valence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli schemi della 
puntino-e-traversa di varie molecole che formano i legami covalenti e 
gli accoppiamenti soli. I puntini e le traverse sono il numero 
di elettroni in ogni coperture di valenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει σημείο-και-διαγώνια 
διαγράμματα των διάφορων μορίων διαμορφώνοντας τους ομοιοπολικούς
δεσμούς και τα απομονωμένα ζευγάρια. Τα σημεία και οι 
σταυροί είναι ο αριθμός ηλεκτρονίων σε κάθε κοχύλι σθένους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los diagramas de la 
punto-y-cruz de las varias moléculas que forman enlaces covalentes y 
pares solitarios. Los puntos y las cruces son el número de 
electrones en cada shell de la valencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kovalente Bindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkt-und-Kreuz Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektronische Konfiguration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Symmetrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">obligation covalente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diagramme de point-et-croix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">configuration électronique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">symétrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ligação covalent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diagrama da ponto-e-cruz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">configuração eletrônica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simetria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legame covalente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema della puntino-e-traversa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">configurazione elettronica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simmetria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομοιοπολικός δεσμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημείο-και-διαγώνιο διάγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρονική διαμόρφωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συμμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enlace covalente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">diagrama de la punto-y-cruz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">configuración electrónica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">simetría</string>
          </keyword>
